column4: Anyone ever have problems with GDESKLETS not booting right when its on the left?
I stopped using gdesklets and started using screenlets
Kinda same thing as a desklet, but works way better
where do i find thse screenlets
I believe the package is enabled in the ubuntu repos.. try at terminal: sudo apt-get install screenlets
Oh do you have synaptic open right now?
I did the apt-get install. Where do I go to find it?
how do i check my temperatures
oh umm.. there should be a screenlet for that
you trying to get vbox running on xp or get xp running inside of vbox?
I did a while ago .. I reinstalled lately though
what do you mean..should be easy to get up
wtf hmm ...you just trying to get it setup to install right?
